description: Custom designed for your precious Amazon New Kindle Paperwhite with Backlight, this case features a combination of functionality and style.Paded premium Faux leather boosts a classy look;No-scratch microfiber interior adds comfort and an additional layer of protection;Wake or put your device to sleep by opening or closing the case.Access to all controls and features.Magnetic closure.Well built to protect your New Kindle Paperwhite for the years to come.This product is sold exclusively by BSCstore. Only buy from BSCstore to get genuine MoKo(TM) products with LIFETIME WARRANTY and superb customer service.
title: MoKo Cover Case for Amazon All-New Kindle Paperwhite (Both 2012 and 2013 versions with 6" Display and Built-in Light), BLACK (With Smart Auto Sleep/Wake feature)
